maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/269/sett.orig: Man...\. we played so long yesterday, non?
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/269/sett.text: Ahh...\. on a joué pendant vraiment longtemps hier, non ?

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/269/sett.orig: I barely got any sleep last night.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/269/sett.text: J'ai presque pas dormi depuis hier.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: Henry
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: Henry

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: In c-c-case you forgot what the p-probe looks like...
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: Au c-c-cas où tu au-au-aurais oublié à q-q-quoi ressemble la s-s-sonde...

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: It looks the same as the o-o-ones next to m-me.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: Elle ressemble à c-c-celles qui sont d-d-derrière moi.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: Henry
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: Henry

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: W-W-Welcome back Lea!
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: R-R-Rebonjour, Lea !

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: Are you f-finished with the s-s-survey?
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: Tu as f-fini avec la re-reconnaissance ?

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: S-S-Splendid!
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: S-S-Splendide !

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: T-T-Thank you so much again!
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: M-M-Merci encore une f-fois !

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: This is almost done, one more and I will have them all.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: C'est presque fini, encore une et je les aurais tous.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: It seems that they use a smart system to provide content.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: On dirait qu'ils utilisent un système intelligent pour faire apparaitre le contenu.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: Maybe an AI that decides what to spawn, based on player interaction?
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: Peut-être que c'est une IA qui décide quoi faire apparaitre en fonction des actions du joueur ?

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: Yes, yes that seems plausible. I just have to analyze all the data and I'm good. Nothing can stop me.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: Oui, oui, c'est plausible. Il faut juste que j'analyse toutes les données et ce sera bon. Rien ne pourra m'arrêter.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: I will get that promotion and never have to work in the field again! Hehehe.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: Je vais enfin avoir ma promotion et j'aurais plus jamais besoin de bosser sur le terrain ! héhéhé.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: O-oh. I'm so... so... S-Sorry. I just... get excited sometimes.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: O-Oh. Je s-s-suis... d-d-désolé. Parfois je s-s-suis... si excité q-q-que je m'emporte.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: D-Don't worry about it, you did your p-part just fine.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: Ne t-t-t'en fais pas pour ça. T-T-Tu as bien fait ton travail.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: T-Take this! I have to be somewhere else.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: P-Prends ça ! J-Je dois y aller.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: Henry
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: Henry

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.orig: H-Hey Lea! Thanks again for h-h-helping me out.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/271/sett.text: H-Hé, Lea ! Merci encore pour t-t-ton aide.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: W-W-What heat...
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Q-Q-Quelle c-chaleur...

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: I guess I need h-help yet again.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: J-J'imagine que j'ai en-encore besoin q-q-que quelqu'un m'aide.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: Henry
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Henry

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: L-Lea! H-H-Hello!
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: L-Lea ! B-B-Bonjour !

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: Hi!
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Salut !

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: Another f-fateful meeting!
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: C-C-C'est le destin qui nous a r-r-réuni !

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: I j-j-just left another p-player with the task to place a p-probe.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Je v-v-viens juste de demander à un au-autre j-joueur d'installer une s-s-sonde.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: It was easier than expected.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: C'est plus facile que ce que je pensais.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: Someone just came and asked, funny looking guy.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Quelqu'un est venu et m'a apporté son aide. Un drôle de type.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: But I don't care as long as the job gets done, since I need the data.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Mais tant que le travail est fait, moi ça me va. J'ai besoin des données !

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: Oh... W-w-wait. Sorry, I got c-carried away.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Oh... Hum... Désolé, je d-d-divaguais.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: A-Anyway... \.\.\. W-Would you like to h-help again?
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: S-Sinon...\.\.\. Est-c-ce tu v-v-eux m'aider encore une f-f-fois ?

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: A-A-A-Are you sure?!? That's amazing!
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: V-V-Vraiment !? F-F-Fantastique !

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: T-Thank you so much!
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: M-Merci b-beaucoup !

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: The t-t-tasks are the same as last time!
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Les t-t-tâches sont les m-m-mêmes que la d-d-dernière fois !

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: I-I want to gather some d-data for \c[3]Maroon Valley\c[0] this time.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: J-Je veux c-c-collecter des d-données sur la \c[3]V-\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0] cette f-fois.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: I-It's a rural area, but I need the survey data.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: C-C'est une r-région très rurale, m-mais j'ai besoin des d-d-données de sondage.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: Here, a-another c-c-compiled list for you...
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Tiens, une n-n-nouvelle liste pour t-t-toi.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: Some enemy scouting, local flora and the landmarks again.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Encore q-q-quelques renseignements s-s-sur les ennemis, la f-f-flore locale et les p-p-points de repères.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: And of course a probe... I asked another player to place it in a cave.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Et bien s-s-sûr une s-s-sonde... J'ai demandé à un au-au-autre joueur de la m-m-mettre dans une g-g-grotte.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: The problem is that I don't know where it is...
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Le problème c'est q-que je s-sais pas d-dans laquelle...

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: I think it was some cave here in the valley. Guess you have to check them all.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Je p-p-pense que c'est une g-grotte ici dans la v-v-vallée. J'imagine q-qu'il faut c-chercher dans t-toutes.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: S-Sorry. I'm awfully... \.\.\. a-agitated today.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Désolé, je suis t-t-tellement...\.\. désordonné aujourd'hui.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: T-Thanks, please come back once you're d-d-done.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: M-Merci, r-r-reviens me voir q-q-quand tu auras f-fini.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: A-and in case you forgot what the p-probe looks like...
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Et au c-c-cas où tu au-au-aurais oublié à q-q-quoi ressemble la s-s-sonde...

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: It looks the same as the o-o-one next to m-me.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Elle ressemble à c-c-celle qui est à côté de moi.

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: O-Oh... You are not interested...
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: O-Oh... Tu n'es p-p-pas intéressée...

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: [shakes head]
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: Ah... I t-t-thought so...
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Ah... J-Je m'y attendais...

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: Yes
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Oui

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.orig: No
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/272/sett.text: Non

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/273/sett.orig: Okay THAT better be worth it!
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/273/sett.text: OK, Il y a intérêt à que ça vaille le coup !

maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/273/sett.orig: Well that certainly took some time to get here.
maps/heat/path-02.json/entities/273/sett.text: Hé ben, ça en a pris du temps pour arriver ici.

maps/heat/path-03.json/entities/239/sett.orig:
\i[arrow-sw] Road to \v[area.heat-village.name]
\i[arrow-e] Maroon Oasis
\i[arrow-n] Road to \v[area.bergen.name]
maps/heat/path-03.json/entities/239/sett.text:
\i[arrow-sw] Chemin vers \v[area.heat-village.name]
\i[arrow-e] Oasis de Maroon
\i[arrow-n] Chemin vers le \v[area.bergen.name]

maps/heat/path-03.json/entities/243/sett.orig: By the way! I'm currently studying. Didn't tell you before, non?
maps/heat/path-03.json/entities/243/sett.text: D'ailleurs, j'ai des cours en ce moment. Je te l'avais jamais dit, non ?
maps/heat/path-03.json/entities/243/sett.note: why don't they simply tell 'btw i'm a student'

maps/heat/path-03.json/entities/243/sett.orig: So I'm in this course that gives out team assignments, right?
maps/heat/path-03.json/entities/243/sett.text: Donc, j'ai une matière avec un travail en groupe à faire...

maps/heat/path-03.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Oui... and today I had a bit of trouble with all of that...
maps/heat/path-03.json/entities/243/sett.text: Ouais... et aujourd'hui j'ai eu un petit problème avec ça...

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/30/setti.orig: You can hear a familiar melody in the distance.
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/30/setti.text: Vous pouvez entendre une mélodie au loin qui vous est familière.

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/200/sett.orig: So you see...\. We had this team meeting today.
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/200/sett.text: Donc tu vois...\. On a fait une réunion avec notre groupe aujourd'hui.

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/200/sett.orig: And everyone was supposed to do their task before then.
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/200/sett.text: Et tout le monde devait avoir fini son travail avant de venir.

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/200/sett.orig: The thing is, I didn't know about it.
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/200/sett.text: Le truc c'est que j'étais pas au courant.

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/201/sett.orig: What a nice, perfectly normal cactus.
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/201/sett.text: Voilà un beau cactus parfaitement normal.

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/201/sett.orig: Oh, a cactus. That's exactly how a cactus is supposed to look like.
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/201/sett.text: Oh, un cactus. Ça ressemble exactement à ça.

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/201/sett.orig: Oh! Look at this perfectly regular cactus. Isn't it nice?
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/201/sett.text: Oh ! Regarde un peu ce cactus parfaitement reproduit ! Il est pas joli ?

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/202/sett.orig: They really got...\. creative with those rock shapes.
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/202/sett.text: Ils ont été vraiment...\. créatifs avec les formations rocheuses ici.

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.orig: That...\. thing sure was unexpected, wasn't it?
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.text: Cette...\. chose, on s'y attendait vraiment pas, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.orig: They really didn't shy away from reusing all the assets they got their hands on, huh?
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.text: Ils n'ont vraiment pas hésité pour réutiliser tout le contenu qu'ils avaient sous la main, hein ?
Des chatons...\. explosifs...\. et tout ça.

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.orig: Phew, but that was definitely worth it, don't you think?
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.text: Pfiou, mais ça valait vraiment le coup, tu trouves pas ?

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.orig: It's just a shame you don't get a proper reward for all the trouble.
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.text: C'est juste dommage de ne pas avoir une vraie récompense après tant d'efforts.

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.orig: That's what you get for playing unofficial content, I guess!
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.text: Mais bon il faut s'y attendre, quand on joue à du contenu non-officiel !

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.orig: Allow me to at least give you a little something for your help!
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.text: Laisse-moi quand même te donner un petit quelque chose pour m'avoir aidé !

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.orig: I gotta say, you've been a great partner for glitching through the game!
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.text: Il faut que je te dise, on est pas mauvais à nous deux pour glitcher à travers le jeu !

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.orig: If I ever hear of another hidden area, I'll let you know!
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.text: Si jamais j'entends parler d'un autre endroit caché dans le jeu, je te le dirais tout de suite !

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.orig: Now then...\. I gotta go.\. Until next time, Lea!
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.text: Bon alors...\. Il faut que j'y aille.\. À la prochaine, Lea !

maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.orig: Seriously Lea, never do this kind of thing again.\. Please.
maps/heat/path-04.json/entities/205/sett.text: Sérieusement Lea... Ne refais jamais un coup comme ça.\. S'il te plait.
